Key Match Events: India won by eight wickets with 46 balls remaining
Rohit Sharma retired hurt after scoring 52
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 6 runs in 3 overs
Rishabh Pant scored 36 not out and ended the match with a reverse lap for six
Suryakumar Yadav was dismissed for 2 runs
Virat Kohli was dismissed for 1 run
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and chose to bowl first
The pitch had green patches and overcast conditions favored bowlers
Both captains would have chosen to bowl first
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma mentioned the importance of getting used to the conditions and sticking to basics
Rohit Sharma expressed hope for a similar performance against Pakistan
Paul Stirling acknowledged the tough conditions and praised India's bowling
Jasprit Bumrah expressed happiness with the conditions and the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch in New York was challenging and had uneven bounce
Concerns were raised about the pitch quality for the upcoming India vs. Pakistan match
